newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria Nat'l bank sets repo, leaves rates steady.
newsitem.headline: Austria Nat'l bank sets repo, leaves rates steady.

text.p: The Austrian National Bank said on Thursday it was calling for bids on one-week securities repurchase agreements at an unchanged 3.0 percent and that it had left its key interest rates steady.
Repo bids have to be in by 1200 GMT on Friday, the central bank said.
Last week, the bank allotted 7.07 billion schillings, or seven percent of bids, in repos.

The Austrian discount rate remains at 2.50 percent and the Lombard emergency financing rate at 4.75 percent. The Gomex money market rate stands at 3.4 percent. -- Julia Ferguson, Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12 254
